td.content: s:patient complains of recurrent mild upset that coworkers deliberately try to be irritating because they are jealous over the past month. The patient reports mild delusional thoughts and frantic speech. patient is a 53 year old m paramedic. o:Height 191 cm, Weight 69.6 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 98, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 14 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed paliperidone - 6 mg daily (in a.m.), and ordered Mental Status exam.

td.content: s:a 54 yr old m paramedic presents with chronic mild epigastric pain. o:Height 190 cm, Weight 69.2 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 98, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 14, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild tenderness to deep palpitation a:Ulcers p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed famotidine - 40 mg daily, and ordered serum helicobacter pylori assay.
